website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for a vintage cathedral-style radio with a tech update.
pros: Bluetooth enabled to use with your wireless devices
Tuning dial illuminates a much admired warm, authentic glow
Handmade, wooden exterior has a distinctly antique look
cons: Volume on Bluetooth is much softer than the radio

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted. No cd player, no cassette deck, just AM/FM and bluetooth. I wanted a quaint old fashion radio to gently play my classical station and pandora from my phone... simply perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ktree504

customer_reviews.title: Sounds and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I used this radio with the Bluetooth in a play I directed for our community theatre. It had to play 1930's music as well as an old Louis boxing match. We can seat 90 in our theatre and it sounded great even in the back row! It looked absolutely authentic too. We did have to cover the red and blue lights of course. It is a shame the radio dial doesn't light up while in Bluetooth mode tho. Now it's a prominent piece in my house I'm using and getting a real kick out of. Awesome product. Simply love it!
customer_reviews.author: JWexpress

customer_reviews.title: A VERY, VERY BAD BUY.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased hundreds, if not thousands, of items on Amazon and I believe that this is my first review. I am SO DISAPPOINTED in this radio, which I just received today. It was not cheap but it works like a cheap radio. Had to move the radio around forever until I received only half decent sound quality. The tuner numbers are so out of sync with actual station you are trying to get it is ridiculous. Seems like there is absolutely no quality control. VERY UNHAPPY WITH THIS PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: JonJay

customer_reviews.title: Great Retro Looking Radio
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio. The sound is nice and the Bluetooth works well. Great design too.
customer_reviews.author: sybilesg

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect gift for my 90yo mom who not only liked ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my 90yo mom who not only liked the design, it is also ease to tune/operate without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dean M.

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this. It fits my style so well and there hasn't been any problem with connecting it to my iPad and playing music. I basically have been leaving it on and have the volume up then control it from my iPad. It was a GREAT buy and am very happy with it. Looks great. I just wish the dial lit up when it was on bluetooth and not just when its on radio, would look cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Trisandra Lunanova

customer_reviews.title: In person, it's much smaller than expected. (Not a "That's what she said joked!")
customer_reviews.text: It looks awesome from a distance. It's about half the size of my old 1940s original. Sound quality is okay, but not what was expected for the money. I wish they'd cut corners either on the sound quality or the overall quality of the construction materials used. I didn't expect them to cut the quality of both. It is functional, but disappointing in almost every way. It does work and has much better sound quality than the original, but fails overall by today's media standard.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Coolidge

customer_reviews.title: Always a conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first order because it was damaged. Received a replacement and all is well. It is always a conversation piece when I have people over. Great look, great sound, great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: MOV

customer_reviews.title: very nice good quality
customer_reviews.text: I would give this item a 10 star, very nice good quality. Has a wire antenna in the back. The radio sound is good and blue tooth works great, a great item to have you can't go wrong, its a must have lovely to look at and enjoyable to listen to. Thank you seller.😊
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Molinaroli

customer_reviews.title: Great...just wish it had better reception.
customer_reviews.text: As far as value it gets 5 stars all the way. I gave it four stars because it is very low powered when it comes to FM/AM reception, and of course by it's very design you can't fine tune in a station to begin with. Having said that on looks alone it's great. I have it sitting beside my bed and primarily use it's Bluetooth function because typically I just throw on some Amazon Prime or Netflix TV series as I'm falling to sleep from my phone. The quality of the speaker connected via Bluetooth is surprisingly good with a nice full sound. I only wish the FM/AM reception and tuning was a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very into vintage and antique items and felt a modern radio would be an eyesore amongst my other belongings so I took a chance and got this. It is one of the best impulse buys I’ve ever come across!! Beautifully made, real wood, clear sound (picks up lots and lots of stations here in c-bus!) I think the real selling point is the bluetooth option, you can play some OTR apps from your phone and you are instantly transported to another time. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality not good
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is ok I guess but not if you want it over "half" volume. It doesn't go loud at all. It doesn't have bass. This is suitable for a small bedroom maybe. This is sound-wise the worst bluetooth ever. I have a tiny 40$ portable bluetooth that has better sound. I do want to say that I love the vintage look though (that was why I chose it) and the real wood for the face plate is really nice. Smells just like my new guitar did.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: A nice compromise between ease of use,  looks, and sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly parents. Technology passed them by and they don't do well with complicated electronic controls. I wanted a radio for them that would be easy to operate and look nice in their assisted living apartment. This little radio met those criteria nicely. Sound is just okay, but they don't think twice about that. They really like it and that's all that matters to me. It was the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: D. McCormack

customer_reviews.title: I could not believe this happened 2 times
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe this happened two times So I did read the reviews and seen that somebody else posted missing side and I could not believe it would happen to me. And of course my last name is Murphy so I knew it would happen to me
customer_reviews.author: Kmur77

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: It's gorgeous and paired with my smartphone right away. I was listening to The Jell-O Program with Jack Benny on YouTube in seconds. What a treat for an old radio comedy buff like me! And it looks great in my newly redecorated study. I love it so much, I've already bought another, similar radio/speaker for another room in my house.
customer_reviews.author: TIM Talks Cooking

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star - Great Sound & Looks
customer_reviews.text: Great little radio! Fits perfectly with our kitchen/dining room decor and has a nice sound playing older music as well as catching all the beats with new music. The design is beautiful and the color is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: erc from MA.

customer_reviews.title: My birds are happier when they hear music.
customer_reviews.text: This radio is very cute and well made but the quality of the sound not very good. My intentions when buying it, was to leave a radio on during the day while I'm at work. My birds get lonely and seem to like having music to listen to while I'm away. I think it's working out alright for that purpose...I haven't heard the birds complain yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Good Product. I expected this item to be a full size 1930s style radio, it’s more like a ‘mini’ version of that. I can only blame myself for not looking at the product dimensions. The knobs and text don’t look correct for the era, other than that it looks pretty good and as far as a radio goes it does what it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sipari

customer_reviews.title: First one had issues but after a return, the second one is great!
customer_reviews.text: I had issues with the first one. It had a steady hum/static noise when bluetooth was being used. You could turn up the music fairly loud and it wasn't as noticeable but I wanted something I could keep in my study to play soft background noise when studying and the hum drove me crazy. Amazon was great and exchanged it for another. The second one is dead quiet and works fine. Speaker is somewhat small so don't expect studio monitor quality here but for what it is and intended to be, it meets all expectations. It's certainly better than iPhone speakers, which is what I was doing previously.
customer_reviews.author: chris hester

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little radio!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little radio! We live in the mountains and radio reception can be hard to tune in but this radio picks up several of the local stations. The Bluetooth feature is great for listening to podcasts and pandora. It is stylish and looks perfect in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Tully Crow

customer_reviews.title: Nice Radio!
customer_reviews.text: I was quite pleased by the overall quality and authentic looking antique detailing of this radio. It has solid tone and ample volume; another plus is the blue tooth capability which makes it the best of both old and new.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Classy and decent mid-range speaker
customer_reviews.text: It is super cute and looks great on my fireplace. The sound quality is decent but not as crisp as a JBL. So as long as you’re ok with moderate and not superb sound quality, you’re in for a classy addition to your dwelling space.
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my Parents and after listening to it for a couple of hours it just completely stopped working. NO sound whatsoever. My Dad fiddled with it for a bit without success. Unfortunately because I ordered it early in October it's NOT eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Jones

customer_reviews.title: Decent little radio
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute little radio. I bought this for my husband as he said he wanted a vintage looking radio. I had wanted one with a cd player, but those were more expensive. This radio is compact and puts out decent sound. My husband was happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma to 6

customer_reviews.title: Great Look, Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio. I am an Old Time Radio fan and the Bluetooth function allows me to stream my favorite programs. I would recommend this to anyone wants to “return to those thrilling days of yesteryear.”
customer_reviews.author: Terry Knapp

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive about purchasing without seeing or using first but based upon the positive reviews, I went for it. It arrived today and I am very impressed thus far!! I was really worried about clear reception in the office as other radios did not work. This one delivered clear, crisp sound. The only minor thing I've noticed is the dial doesn't line up with the station you are actually listing too, which isn't the end of the world. Just glad it gets good reception and sounds good. I'd buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Need somewhere to plug it in.  It is not battery powered.
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio. The speaker quality is excellent, and the look of the product is beautiful. They did a great job in putting it together. The fact that they back it with a five years warranty says that they make a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent styling, build quality, and sound quality for the money. Radio reception is good but not great. Bluetooth sound quality is outstanding for a unit in this size and price range. Looks great in our farmhouse kitchen nook. Everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and great sounding radio
customer_reviews.text: The Radio arrived in record time period extremely easy to set up pretty much take it out of the Box and plug it in There is also a Bluetooth setting which is very easy to connect to And the old time look adds a lot to the ambiance of the room. Beautiful sound. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Souler

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful item
customer_reviews.text: This retro radio, is perfect for setting the scene for a family get together. For my purpose, this was perfect. Service from the seller is also quite excellent, and I would heartedly recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Hill  Billy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered on time and in good condition. Looks very nice and sounds good. Only 3 stars because tuner does not light up in any setting. Dissapointung but I am still happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Love the vintage look and the advantages of modern technology
customer_reviews.text: Love the vintage look and the advantages of modern technology. It does not get all the AM stations I usually listen to and I wish it were a bit larger, but other than that it has been a wonderful addition to the household. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: J Jett

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised. Would buy again.very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: For the money, the sound is EXCELLENT the volume is good, and if there’s someone who likes vintage stuff, it’d be a great hit. Very easy to use and set up, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Jarnagin

customer_reviews.title: Old timely Radio brings back Radio'  Golden Age!
customer_reviews.text: Despite other's complaints, the Bluetooth functions quite well! I don't look at thradio in the mode, just listen from an adjacent room. Bliss!
customer_reviews.author: Nath'l. D. Aiken

customer_reviews.title: It is a gem!
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio. It looks like one that my grandmother had when I was a child. The best part is that I usually have a great deal of difficulty getting good reception but this radio has given me a whole new range of stations. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Morrine

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Good looks
customer_reviews.text: Bought as s Christmas present. It was damaged upon receipt but seller was excellent about replacement. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this little radio!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this. It’s exactly as shown and went perfect in the space we bought it for. The sound quality is great. We had problems with the first one we ordered, the Bluetooth function would not work. The company responded to my email within hours and we had a replacement in just a couple of days. Love the product and the customer service. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mona Saperstien

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good little radio. I love to turn on big band tunes and today I listened to audio of President Roosevelt’s speech to Congress asking for a declaration of war against Japan. Although it’s not my era I’ve always been fascinated with that generation.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great "old fashioned" radio.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my in-laws. Great sound quality, picks up stations, even without external antenna. Quality of wood is good, very nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a relative. She loves it. Great sound and style. Awesome for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bad but not Good
customer_reviews.text: Typical 21st century quality. Would have liked better but not willing to pay for an antique that I would have to retrofit with Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Edward E Mazzotta

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, great sound/speakers and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive piece of display in my waiting room while enjoy the music, the sound/speakers are great and great quality and get many many positive comments from patients. Love this and highly recommend it. Love it that it has a Bluetooth option in addition to AM/FM. Go for this, if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: J-S.

customer_reviews.title: Just like the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas present to my uncle. He loved it, it looks just like a real radio from back in the day, but it's cooler, because it's Bluetooth accessible. Looks great, sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Pappa Rotney loves this radio!!️ I like the ac power source. I’ve placed it bedside. The large volume control is nice. I can reach and adjust volume by feel. An excellent product
customer_reviews.author: mothergooch78

customer_reviews.title: Second to a BOSE sound radio
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't hope for better. The only downside is if there is a power outage, there are no batteries to back up. Other than that, the volume does not have to be too high to be heard across the room. The acoustics in this radio are fabulous. The walnut color blends beautifully with the décor in our home. The vintage style is timeless.
customer_reviews.author: Urban, J

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! It is a wonderful addition to my old fashion parlor. I use it all the time the sound quality is great and it has never failed me. I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: B. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works real nice , for those complaining about low volume in BT mode , try going to BT pull down menu , set sound preferences , and run the volume up . It will give you plenty of sound . Closing in on first year , still nice , and looks good . Oh ya , turn off computer BT before ya turn off radio BT unless ya like getting blasted .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for my husband. He loves it! This was a little on the pricey side. But happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Used tape to cover the LED lights
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Used tape to cover the LED lights. Looks good, sounds good. Use it for FM and streaming music from Amazon Prime via my phone and BT. May get another for our screened porch when it is built.
customer_reviews.author: S. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp, works well
customer_reviews.text: Although the sound is more than adequate, it aint no bose. The radio with physical cord antenna is righteous, works very well. I'd have liked an aux cord output--but is a 'look" piece and bluetooth is just fine. An amazon surprise: Bigger and sturdier than expected. It's nice. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Design Build

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, great look and sound.
customer_reviews.text: What a handsome addition to any home. I was impressed this the look and sound of this radio. I would buy again....perhaps as a unique gift.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Love my new old radio
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing with it for about an hour now, and I'm very pleased. It looks adorable! Mine has a few nics in the wood, (real wood btw), but i don't mind, kind of adds to it I think. I'm no audiophile but it sounds great to me and is over all very charming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the look, sound quality is a bit low
customer_reviews.text: The speaker doesnt sound really great when turned up to loud. It doesnt really get very loud to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Ssgamboa

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this as a gift and the recipient loved it. It works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift and the recipient loved it. It works perfectly, was exactly the look he wanted. Arrived on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tierra Fennimore

customer_reviews.title: Radio
customer_reviews.text: I love that this radio has bluetooth! Sounds really good too. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has a great sound for such a small radio
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 17 year old son, and he loves it! The sound, style, everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fargo

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio
customer_reviews.text: If you like the look of a vintage radio with todays technology this is the radio for you.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M

customer_reviews.title: Nice radio
customer_reviews.text: Very nice old style radio,.sound is better then expected. Smaller but still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Rienbolt

customer_reviews.title: Very retro stylish
customer_reviews.text: I found the price to be a bit high but the style is really cool and I do enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: reader80

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but small.
customer_reviews.text: Radio quality is excellent and the addition of Bluetooth helps it fulfill its use for period music. It is, however, small for a radio of its style.
customer_reviews.author: Imperium Lex

customer_reviews.title: Great radio for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this radio for the price. Has AM/FM which comes in clearly for sound. Covers the hole house.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy I

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful radio!
customer_reviews.text: Love this radio! It’s beautiful & fits perfectly with my vintage decor! Size is perfect as it’s not too big or too small & for the size the sound quality is so nice! It gets pretty loud, and I’ve never had any issues with it connecting to my phone or getting a radio station! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: If your expectations are reasonable you will not be disappointed. Don’t buy this thinking you will get the same workmanship as an original, it’s not but it is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Jman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking. The sound is good, not great, as long as it's not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great look, good bluetooth, so-so radio
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of it. The sound quality using Bluetooth is good. I don't know why, but the quality when playing the radio the sound quality is heavy on the treble - sounds hollow and "tinny"
customer_reviews.author: Thinks2Much2

customer_reviews.title: we liked it.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing we disliked was that the voices sounded a bit tinny. But that is all.
customer_reviews.author: Sqeeky Clean

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift and it does not work. We have tried everything and quite a few times to make sure we weren't missing something. It sounds like there is something loose inside of the product because there is a clinking noise whenever it is shifted or moved. It's a shame because it's a really gorgeous piece, but will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lilbee

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality from a small package
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality from a small package. Love the retro look. Purchased as a gift for my wife who had wanted a small radio for the laundry room. Was pleasantly surprised by the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom who just wanted to listen to the radio but didn't want to be confused with to many buttons. Sound is perfect and would love one for myself now. Brings back memories of just being able to turn the knob and get a station to listen to music.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence M.

customer_reviews.title: An excellent vintage themed radio...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little radio. Nice clear sound, quick easy Bluetooth merge, and a reasonable price. Looks great with my turn of the century office decor. A very good purchase and quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Charles on the beach...

customer_reviews.title: Very good  radio
customer_reviews.text: This radio is great. It was a little smaller than I expected but still love it. The sound is very clear. The dial lights up so that's cool. It goes great with the somewhat antique style of my home. 10/10. Will probably try to convince my husband that we need multiples for different rooms of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Yale Sagor

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, Sounds great, has AM, FM and Bluetooth options.
customer_reviews.author: akorn

customer_reviews.title: It's fun
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this radio. It's so much fun with Bluetooth. I would give it as a gift. LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Mary Welton

customer_reviews.title: I returned mine
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in this. It was much smaller than what I read. I returned it for that amount of money. Speaker was small
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Denman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best money i spent all year, really great looks and sound, i love it, i bought another, i love it so, i know bouht 3
customer_reviews.author: Dee dee

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: love it sound quality is great so elegant and thick so vintage and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: anna rivera

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great, even turned up quite loud
customer_reviews.text: This radio went so well in my new room! It was cute and stylish without being big and awkward. The sound is great, even turned up quite loud!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and reception, live board cast compared to computer/internet radio that’s delayed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Dad loved His Radio.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Quality product. Sounds Great and my Fathers Birthday was better because He received it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette medina

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth audio skips
customer_reviews.text: This is very disappointing. While listening to an audiobook the audio skips after every sentence read. This makes this product quite useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this cathedral radio speaker quite a bit. Great mood setter for listening to OTR shows, which is mainly all I do with it. Streaming to it is easy peasy. I was looking at a few radios like this, but I’m happy that I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Curley

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: Looks authentic. Sound is good. Handsome piece for the price
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence R Berger

customer_reviews.title: Sound is perfect and also plays Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I love this and my husband does too! Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived, I plugged it in and it wouldn’t work at all. I sent it back immediately as it was going to be a birthday gift. Very disappointed in the radio!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Cute “old” radio
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little radio. It’s easy to hook up with Bluetooth. Sound isn’t the best quality but it works for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Blasiar

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this to romance an old radio, he loves the sound quality!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Noebel

customer_reviews.title: no 3.5 aux in
customer_reviews.text: Aux input is by bluetooth only, which is easy to set up, but is a drain on connected devices which must turn on bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: S. Heath

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My mom loved this! It was easy for her to connect her phone to and use.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle jones

customer_reviews.title: Such a great device! Really impressed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Such a great device! Really impressed with the quality! Great for listening to Old Time Radio shows or podcasts.
customer_reviews.author: jeeves

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio good looking and great sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: This radio is very well made and has great sound quailty. Alot of bang for the buck, I am glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gino Pullaro

customer_reviews.title: Danger.
customer_reviews.text: Some caution needed as my product just made two loud bangs and then died. Components inside the unit exploded with some force!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Great addition to our living room. Awesome sound quality and tuning. No problems with anything!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Sound not the best .
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband's office he loves how it looks not the best sound..
customer_reviews.author: Sanpore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly just as I imagined, no flaws to speak of whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: David kish

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother-in-law, she absolutely loves it ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Volume unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome but the radio volume is unreliable. Looking to send it back for a new one or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson R Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Stays on the channel
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy the clarity and ease of finding stations. It stays on the signal and we enjoy the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S. Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: really looks like an authentic olde radio
